***** Braj[edit] *****
**** Pronoun[edit] ****
या (yā)
   1. oblique of यह (yah)
            Synonym: इहिं (ihĩ)
*** See also[edit] ***
    * इस (is) (hindi eqivalent)
***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /jɑː/, [jäː]
**** Etymology 1[edit] ****
Borrowed from Classical_Persian یا‎ (yā).
*** Conjunction[edit] ***
या • (yā) (Urdu spelling یا‎)
   1. or
            Synonyms: अथवा (athvā), वा (vā), कि (ki)
            क्या आपको चाय या कॉफ़ी चाहिए?
                  kyā āpko cāy yā kŏfī cāhie?
                  Would you like tea or coffee?
            कौन बड़ा है, सुमित या सुमन?
                  kaun baṛā hai, sumit yā suman?
                  Who's bigger, Sumit or Suman?
**** Etymology 2[edit] ****
Borrowed from Arabic يا‎ (yā).
*** Interjection[edit] ***
या • (yā) (Urdu spelling یا‎)
   1. O( vocative particle)
            Synonyms: (more common) अरे (are), हे (he)
            या अल्लाह, क्या हो गया है!
                  yā allāh, kyā ho gayā hai!
                  O god, what has happened! (Islam)
***** Nepali[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [jä]
    * Phonetic Devanagari: या
**** Conjunction[edit] ****
या • (yā)
   1. or
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [ja]
**** Postposition[edit] ****
या • (yā) (Newa Spelling 𑐫𑐵)
   1. marks the genitive case: of, belonging to

या f

**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Proto-Indo-European *yeh₂-.
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Vedic) IPA(key): /jɑː/
    * (Classical) IPA(key): /jɑː/
**** Noun[edit] ****
या • (yā) f
   1. going
   2. a car
   3. restraining
   4. religious meditation
   5. attaining
   6. pudendum_muliebre
*** Declension[edit] ***
                 Feminine ā-stem declension of या (yā)
                              Singular Dual     Plural
                 Nominative   याः      यौ       याः
                              yāḥ      yau      yāḥ
                 Vocative     याः      यौ       याः
                              yāḥ      yau      yāḥ
                 Accusative   याम्     यौ       याः / यः¹
                              yām      yau      yāḥ / yaḥ¹
                 Instrumental या       याभ्याम् याभिः
                              yā       yābhyām  yābhiḥ
                 Dative       ये       याभ्याम् याभ्यः
                              ye       yābhyām  yābhyaḥ
                 Ablative     यः       याभ्याम् याभ्यः
                              yaḥ      yābhyām  yābhyaḥ
                 Genitive     यः       योः      यानाम् / याम्¹
                              yaḥ      yoḥ      yānām / yām¹
                 Locative     यि       योः      यासु
                              yi       yoḥ      yāsu
                 Notes            * ¹Perhaps
